attributes.action: Make self defense classes accessible in schools to young females.
attributes.additional_details:
Women are given guidance on how to keep safe but now is the time that imperative action needs to be implemented so that women have some form of self defense, if this is taught in schools that will be taken into adulthood and at least if in a dangerous situation a women would have been given some tools to use to defend themselves whether its from an assault in their home or from a stranger.
Government need to take a grip of the pandemic of violence against women.
attributes.background: Implementation of self defense classes in schools for young women, there is a clear increase in the threat of violence towards young women, with the most recent being that of Sarah Everand and Sabina Nessa, those of which were published yet 78 women have been murdered in violent attacks this year

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: 

Add Self Defence to the National Curriculum from Year 7 upwards:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597552
